name: Beads Krieg
description:
My rushed entry for Game Maker's Toolkit's 2019 Game Jam, with this year's subject being "Only One".

I came up with a Marble Madness/Uniracers inspired game where the player can only control his bead by jumping. To make matters worse for the player, the player must reach first place at all times in order to progress.

Music by the excellent band The Freak Fandango Orchestra.

https://freakfandango.bandcamp.com/
